entry.title: DevNTell - Bifrost
entry.summary:
üåà GM In this week's episode of DevNTell, we were given an overview of Bifrost by Co-Founders Kartik (CEO) and Samraaj (CTO). üåü Developer Spotlight Kartik and Samraaj are long-time friends who first met at RIT and then eventually became co-founders together. They started their first business in web3 by creating a smart contract based deadman switch which helped land both of them into Y-Combinator. After a while, they realized that the market conditions weren't quite right for that product to take off and turned to another project that Samraaj had been working on a few years ago. That product was the non-AI version of Bifrost which, at the time, didn't scale since machine-generated code was still relatively new; however, with the recent advancements in AI and after its incorporation into Bifrost, they quickly went viral after releasing their first demo video. They're on a mission to remove all the monotonous work of implementing design so that engineers can focus on the fun stuff! üî• About Bifrost Bifrost uses AI to turn your Figma designs into clean React code automatically. It's the first design-to-code product that works! Resources: Bifrost: https://www.bifrost.so/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/bifrostcode Kartik's Twitter: https://twitter.com/sathaxe Samraaj's Twitter: https://twitter.com/samraaj
üé• Presentation
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v-V_OxKT4yI

entry.title: DevNTell - ChainBrain
entry.summary:
üåà GM In this week's episode of DevNTell, we were given an overview of ChainBrain by Founder and CEO Marissa Posner. üåü Developer Spotlight Marissa is the founder and CEO of ChainBrain, a Web3 business intelligence tool that allows business users to search, visualize, and take action on real-time changes in blockchain data. Marissa first got into Web3 through trading and being a data scientist, she was naturally interested in digging into the data around tokens and NFTs. After some exploration, she soon realized the complexity behind the analysis of the data. Thus, the seeds of inspiration were laid for ChainBrain to take shape. Leveraging her deep expertise in Machine Learning, she splits her time between the dynamic hubs of NYC and Tel Aviv while building ChainBrain. üî• About ChainBrain ChainBrain is a Web3 business intelligence tool for real-time analytics, predictions, and executable on-chain actions. Users can visualize any on-chain data through dashboards and charts. Resources: ChainBrain link: https://chainbrain.vercel.app/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/chainbrainapp üé• Presentation
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=emntsJshpkQ

entry.title: DevNTell - Sumer
entry.summary:
üåà GM In this week's episode of DevNTell, we were joined by Mario and Uri who gave us an overview of Sumer üåü Developer Spotlight Mario is a software developer working at Sumer where he is building an observability tool for dapps. He got into web3 early in 2017 on the speculation side of things but quickly fell in love with the technology. Uri a DevRel at Sumer holding a master's degree in cyber security. He got into the web3 space in 2020 on the speculation side of things; however, quickly fell in love with the technology after going straight down the rabbit hole. üî• About Sumer From the Sumer Docs: Sumer is the frictionless and powerful web3 Performance Monitoring tool that helps you to find bugs, prevent potential revenue losses and improve user experience. Resources: Website: https://www.getsumer.com/ Docs: https://docs.getsumer.com/sumer/ GitHub: https://github.com/getsumer Twitter: https://twitter.com/getsumer Mario's Twitter: https://twitter.com/zmariuz Uri's Twitter: https://twitter.com/uri0x01
üé• Presentation
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j4GS5fuqhV8

entry.title: DevNTell - Subscription memberships with Unlock Protocol
entry.summary:
üåà GM In this week's episode of DevNTell, Christopher Carfi (Head of Marketing, Unlock Protocol) gave us an overview of how we can use Unlock Protocol to build subscription memberships as NFTs üåü Developer Spotlight Christopher Carfi is a community-builder, marketer & technologist exploring the intersection between creators, community, and business models related to NFTs, DAOs, and web3, and is Head of Marketing at Unlock Protocol. Prior to joining Unlock, Chris was at GoDaddy for nearly six years and headed up content and community efforts globally. During the course of his 20+ year career, Chris has worked in startups and big companies, and has developed marketing, customer community and evangelist programs for a number of brands you've heard of. He currently lives in the Bay Area with his family. üî• About Unlock Protocol From the Unlock Protocol GitHub Repo: Unlock is a membership protocol, built on a blockchain. It enables creators to monetize their content or software without relying on a middleman. It lets consumers manage all of their subscriptions in a consistent way, as well as earn discounts when they share the best content and applications they use. Resources: Presentation deck: https://t.co/jX6UGNxdZL Unlock Protocol: https://unlock-protocol.com/ Developer Docs: https://t.co/NwlRWf29dI Unlock Protocol video tutorials: https://t.co/I2M1k0DSlG Unlock Protocol code examples & tutorials: https://t.co/JcSMAH6Rd8 GitHub: https://github.com/unlock-protocol/unlock Unlock Protocol Blog: https://t.co/L976YXYDEf Unlock Protocol Discord: https://t.co/QX1o4NoVve Twitter: https://twitter.com/unlockprotocol Christophers Twitter: https://twitter.com/ccarfi
üé• Presentation
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hUkSgOhTsJo
